message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it to be a valuable asset. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. I really like the product, but I have to stay within my budget. Can you meet me at this price?
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $12,500 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $13,500.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product. What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $13,500, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $13,000. Can you consider this price?
